subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: When Bartoli won the women's singles title at Wimbledon, it was a great story about perseverance and dreaming big, but don't expect up-and-comers to adopt her style anytime soon.
snippet: When Bartoli won the women's singles title at Wimbledon, it was a great story about perseverance and dreaming big, but don't expect up-and-comers to adopt her style anytime soon.
